title: Suamiku Paling Sweet
resume:
The story tells Qisya Iriz (Mawar Rashid), university graduates who had become a nanny while Hafiey (brother Nik Adam Mika), the grandson of a friend of his mother, Mrs. Fathma (Liza Abdullah). Nanny-nanny before which can not survive with a mischievous attitude Hafiey it. Qisya accept her proposals as it is only for a while. When Qisya stubborn met with Hafiey, it will lead to chaos.
Both parents Hafiey had died in an accident. Because of that, Hafiey regarded the uncle Izz Haikal (Syafiq Kyle) as his own father. Izz willing to do anything for the happiness of Hafiey. After meeting with caregivers Hafiey, heart pounding Izz and Qisya often. But they do not care about the true meaning behind the heart palpitations occur until an event that changed the fate of both their lives.
